title: Typefaces 'reveal personality traits' (Daily Telegraph)
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20090430074132/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 24.May.2001 7.27am 

Typophiles will find this article from London's Daily Telegraph quite amusing-   
   
Typefaces 'reveal personality traits'   
   
 [http://www.telegraph.co.uk:80/et?ac=000652118555053&rtmo=VrgsJfsK&atmo=99999999&pg=/et/01/5/24/nfont24.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090430074132/http:/www.telegraph.co.uk/et?ac=000652118555053&rtmo=VrgsJfsK&atmo=99999999&pg=/et/01/5/24/nfont24.html)
author: Jared Benson
